fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper

Class ExtendedSmppSessionConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudhopper.smpp.type.SmppConnectionConfiguration
      • com.cloudhopper.smpp.SmppSessionConfiguration
        • fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.ExtendedSmppSessionConfiguration

  • public class ExtendedSmppSessionConfiguration
extends com.cloudhopper.smpp.SmppSessionConfiguration
    Additional options to configure how Cloudhopper should behave:
    • Additional timeouts (response, unbind)
    • Retry strategy for connection
    • Options for session management strategy
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
